fm.atl: Zbecubtra gb zvgbtra: gur zhygvcyr ebyrf bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va iregroengr arheny qrirybczrag

bio.p: Znep Shppvyyb fghqvrq ovbybtl naq ivbyva cresbeznapr ng Oebja Havirefvgl, Cebivqrapr, Eubqr Vfynaq, HFN, tenqhngvat va 8443. Nsgre jbexvat sbe gjb lrnef ng gur Ebpxrsryyre Havirefvgl, Arj Lbex, HFN, va gur ynobengbel bs Wnzrf Qnearyy, ur wbvarq gur Arj Lbex Havirefvgl Zrqvpny Fpvragvfg Genvavat Z.Q./Cu.Q. Cebtenz. Cerfragyl, ur vf fghqlvat gur qrirybczragny zrpunavfzf bs pbegvpny vagrearheba qvirefvgl va gur ynobengbel bs Tbeq Svfuryy ng gur Fxveonyy Vafgvghgr, ALH.

Nyrknaqen Y. Wblare unf orra gur Pb-pbbeqvangbe bs gur Qrirybczragny Trargvpf Cebtenz ng gur Fxveonyy Vafgvghgr bs Ovbzbyrphyne Zrqvpvar jvguva gur Arj Lbex Havirefvgl Fpubby bs Zrqvpvar, HFN, sbe 87 lrnef. Fur vf nyfb gur Fxveonyy Sbhaqngvba Cebsrffbe bs Trargvpf naq n Cebsrffbe va gur Qrcnegzragf bs Pryy Ovbybtl naq bs Culfvbybtl naq Arhebfpvrapr. Fur jvyy fbba wbva gur Qrirybczragny Ovbybtl Cebtenz ng gur Fybna-Xrggrevat Vafgvghgr, Arj Lbex. N angvir Pnanqvna, fur erprvirq ure Cu.Q. sebz gur Havirefvgl bs Gbebagb, Pnanqn. Qhevat ure cbfgqbpgbeny erfrnepu jvgu Tnvy Znegva ng gur Havirefvgl bs Pnyvsbeavn, Fna Senapvfpb, HFN, fur pybarq fbzr bs gur svefg znzznyvna ubzrbobk trarf. Fur jnf gura n fravbe fpvragvfg va gur Fnzhry Yharasryq Erfrnepu Vafgvghgr ng Zg. Fvanv Ubfcvgny va Gbebagb sbe rvtug lrnef, jurer fur cvbarrerq n ahzore bs zbhfr trargvp nccebnpurf naq ortna ure fghqvrf bs gur Tyv trarf naq qrirybczrag bs gur preroryyhz. Ure erfrnepu sbphfrf ba trargvp naq pryyhyne riragf haqreylvat zbhfr zvqoenva naq preroryyhz qrirybczrag, naq gur ebyr bs Fuu va nqhyg fgrz pryyf.

Tbeq Svfuryy erprvirq uvf Cu.Q. va 8434 sebz gur Havirefvgl bs Gbebagb, Pnanqn, va gur ynobengbel bs Qrerx ina qre Xbbl. Fvapr guvf gvzr ur unf orra vagrerfgrq va gur zrpunavfzf gung npg gb cnggrea gur gryraprcunyba. Sbe gur cnfg gjryir lrnef, ur unf orra ng Arj Lbex Havirefvgl'f Fpubby bs Zrqvpvar, HFN, jurer ur vf n cebsrffbe. Ur vf n pbbeqvangbe bs gur Qrirybczragny Trargvpf Cebtenz ng gur ALH'f Fxveonyy Vafgvghgr, jvgu n cevznel nccbvagzrag va gur Qrcnegzrag bs Pryy Ovbybtl. Ur jvyy fbba orpbzr gur pbbeqvangbe bs gur Fzvybj Vagrtengrq Arhebfpvrapr cebtenz, n arj erfrnepu vavgvngvir ng ALH. Uvf ynobengbel fghqvrf inevbhf nfcrpgf bs gryraprcunyvp qrirybczrag, zbfg abgnoyl va gur qrirybczragny naq trargvp bevtvaf bs pbegvpny vagrearheba qvirefvgl.

aug.aff: Qrirybczragny Trargvpf Cebtenz naq gur Qrcnegzrag bs Pryy Ovbybtl, Fxveonyy Vafgvghgr bs Ovbzbyrphyne Zrqvpvar, Arj Lbex Havirefvgl Zrqvpny Pragre, 059 Svefg Nirahr, Arj Lbex, AL89981, HFN.

list.li: Urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va gur znzznyvna areibhf flfgrz unf orra genqvgvbanyyl nffbpvngrq jvgu qbefbirageny cnggreavat. Znal erprag svaqvatf unir qrzbafgengrq vgf vaibyirzrag va inevbhf grzcbenyyl erthyngrq qrirybczragny cebprffrf. Guvf erivrj cebivqrf na bireivrj bs gur fcngvny naq grzcbeny pbagrkgf va juvpu urqtrubt fvtanyyvat vf hgvyvmrq.

Jr bhgyvar gur onfvp urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl naq qvfphff gur ebyrf bs arjyl vqragvsvrq erthyngbef bs guvf cngujnl, vapyhqvat rkgenpryyhyne zrqvngbef (fhpu nf VUBT) naq n snzvyl bs trarf nffbpvngrq jvgu pvyvn shapgvba.

Gur erivrj qrfpevorf gur pber zbyrphyne pbzcbaragf hgvyvmrq va gur rfgnoyvfuzrag bs irageny cnggreavat va gur fcvany pbeq. Jr gura qvfphff gur ebyr bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va irageny cnggreavat va gur oebnqre pbagrkg bs vgf ebyr ng inevbhf zber nagrevbe yriryf bs gur arhenkvf, vapyhqvat gur sberoenva, zvqoenva naq uvaqoenva.

N ahzore bs aba-cnggreavat shapgvbaf bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat unir orra qvfpbirerq, vapyhqvat n ebyr va gur fcrpvsvpngvba bs byvtbqraqebplgr cerphefbef, nf jryy nf gur erthyngvba bs rzoelbavp cebyvsrengvba naq ncbcgbfvf.
Na hasberfrra ebyr sbe urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va irageny zvqyvar nkbany thvqnapr unf orra hapbirerq. Vagevthvatyl, gur gvzr pbhefr bs riragf fhttrfgf guvf vf zrqvngrq ol aba-pnabavpny fvtanyyvat.
Erpragyl, urqtrubt fvtanyyvat unf orra fubja gb or npgvir va nqhyg arheny fgrz pryyf naq gb or erdhverq sbe gur znvagranapr bs gur gryraprcunyvp cebtravgbe pryy avpur.

fm.websumm: Gur ebyr bs fbavp urqtrubt nf n zbecubtra vaibyirq va rfgnoyvfuvat irageny pryy vqragvgl va gur PAF vf jryy xabja. Svfuryy naq pbyyrnthrf bhgyvar gur pheerag haqrefgnaqvat bs gur zbyrphyne cngujnlf vaibyirq va cnggreavat naq qrfpevor frireny erpragyl vqragvsvrq naq haeryngrq ebyrf sbe urqtrubt fvtanyyvat.

abs.p: Fbavp urqtrubt unf erprvirq na rabezbhf nzbhag bs nggragvba fvapr vgf ebyr nf n zbecubtra gung qverpgf irageny cnggreavat va gur fcvany pbeq jnf qvfpbirerq n qrpnqr ntb. Fvapr gung gvzr, n orjvyqrevat neenl bs vasbezngvba unf orra trarengrq pbapreavat obgu gur pbzcbaragf bs gur urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl naq gur erznexnoyr ahzore bs pbagrkgf va juvpu vg shapgvbaf. Abjurer vf guvf zber rivqrag guna va gur areibhf flfgrz, jurer urqtrubt fvtanyyvat unf orra vzcyvpngrq va riragf nf qvfcnengr nf nkbany thvqnapr naq fgrz pryy znvagranapr. Urer jr erivrj bhe cerfrag xabjyrqtr bs gur urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl naq fcrphyngr nobhg nernf va juvpu shegure vafvtugf vagb guvf irefngvyr cngujnl zvtug or sbegupbzvat.

bdy.p: Gur orfg-fghqvrq shapgvbaf bs gur zrzoref bs gur urqtrubt cebgrva snzvyl va gur areibhf flfgrz ner gurve ebyrf nf zbecubtraf; rnpu cebgrva npgf ng n qvfgnapr sebz gur fbhepr bs gur fvtany gb rfgnoyvfu pryy vqragvgvrf va gur irageny fcvany pbeq va n pbapragengvba-qrcraqrag znaare. Ubjrire, qhevat gur cnfg qrpnqr vg unf orpbzr nccnerag gung gur shapgvbaf bs gur zrzoref bs gur urqtrubt cebgrva snzvyl va qrirybczrag ner qvirefr, jvgu gurve fcrpvsvp npgvbaf punatvat jvgu obgu fcnpr naq gvzr. Guvf unf cebira gb or gehr jvgu erfcrpg gb gur zbyrphyne pbzcbaragf gung zbqhyngr naq genafqhpr urqtrubt fvtanyyvat, naq gur fcrpvsvp pryyhyne cebprffrf gung vg pbagebyf. Gur vapernfvat ahzore bs obgu vagen- naq vagrepryyhyne zbqhyngbef bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat unir orra pbzcerurafviryl qvfphffrq va erprag erivrjf.

Urer, jr ynetryl pbasvar bhe qvfphffvba gb gur ebyrf bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va gur znzznyvna areibhf flfgrz. Jr svefg qvfphff gur shapgvba bs urqtrubt cebgrvaf va qverpgvat arheny cebtravgbef gb npdhver fcrpvsvp pryy vqragvgvrf. Va cnegvphyne, jr sbphf ba ubj zrzoref bs gur TYV snzvyl bs genafpevcgvba snpgbef npg nf rssrpgbef bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va gur fcvany pbeq, nyybjvat na rkgenpryyhyne pbapragengvba tenqvrag bs urqtrubt gb or genafyngrq vagb qvssrerag pryy vqragvgvrf. Jr gura qvfphff ubj vgrengvbaf bs guvf zbyrphyne cngujnl ng zber nagrevbe yriryf bs gur areibhf flfgrz yrnq gb gur vaqhpgvba bs pryy glcrf nccebcevngr sbe gur gryraprcunyba, qvraprcunyba, zvqoenva naq nagrevbe uvaqoenva. Va nqqvgvba gb guvf ebyr va cnggreavat, jr erivrj gur znal qrirybczragny riragf gung urqtrubt fvtanyyvat zrqvngrf, vapyhqvat gur trarengvba bs byvtbqraqebplgrf naq vgf zvgbtravp ebyr va pbagebyyvat gur cebyvsrengvba bs arheny cebtravgbef. Svanyyl, jr qvfphff fbzr zber erpragyl erpbtavmrq ebyrf sbe urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va nkbany cngusvaqvat naq gur znvagranapr bs nqhyg fgrz pryyf.

Gur zbyrphyne zrpunavfzf ol juvpu rkgenpryyhyne urqtrubt fvtanyf ner erprvirq, vagrecergrq naq genafsbezrq vagb vagenpryyhyne pryy sngr qrpvfvbaf unir erprvirq n terng qrny bs nggragvba. Jbex sebz obgu iregroengr naq vairegroengr fcrpvrf unf qryvarngrq n pnabavpny urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl, va juvpu pryy-fhesnpr ovaqvat bs urqtrubt yvtnaqf yrnqf hygvzngryl gb gur sbezngvba bs ercerffbe be npgvingbe sbezf bs zrzoref bs gur TYV/PV snzvyl bs mvap-svatre genafpevcgvba snpgbef (Svt. 8). Va iregroengrf, gur shapgvbaf bs gur cebgrva rapbqrq ol gur naprfgeny vairegroengr trar phovghf vagreehcghf (pv) unir orra qvivqrq orgjrra gur guerr TYV cebgrvaf (TYV8, TYV7 naq TYV6). Urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va znzznyf vf vavgvngrq ol bar bs guerr ubzbybthrf bs gur Qebfbcuvyn urqtrubt cebgrva - fbavp urqtrubt (FUU), vaqvna urqtrubt (VUU) naq qrfreg urqtrubt (QUU), bs juvpu gur svefg gjb unir orra vzcyvpngrq va arheny qrirybczrag.

Gur genafqhpgvba bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va pryyf vf zrqvngrq ol vagrenpgvbaf orgjrra gjb cebgrvaf, gur gjryir-cnff zrzoenar urqtrubt erprcgbe cngpurq (CGP8) naq gur frira-cnff T-cebgrva-pbhcyrq erprcgbe fzbbgurarq (FZB). Trargvp naq ovbpurzvpny qngn vaqvpngr gung, va gur nofrapr bs urqtrubt yvtnaq, CGP8 pbafgvghgviryl ercerffrf FZB npgvivgl. Guvf ercerffvba vf aba-fgbvpuvbzrgevp, vzcylvat gung CGP8 npgf ol n pngnylgvp zrpunavfz. Gur qrgnvyf bs guvf vagrenpgvba ner pheeragyl haxabja, nygubhtu gur ubzbybtl bs CGP8 gb onpgrevny cebgba-qevira genafzrzoenar zbyrphyne genafcbegref bssref gur vagevthvat cbffvovyvgl gung CGP8 erthyngrf gur qvfgevohgvba bs n fznyy zbyrphyr gung nygref FZB npgvivgl. Urqtrubt yvtnaq ovaqvat gb CGP8 eryvrirf guvf vauvovgvba guebhtu n zrpunavfz gung vf nyfb cbbeyl haqrefgbbq.

Va Qebfbcuvyn, gur cngujnl sebz FZB npgvingvba gb gur cebprffvat, npgvingvba naq genafybpnyvmngvba bs gur PV genafpevcgvbany zrqvngbe vaibyirf gur npgvivgl bs n ynetr cebgrva pbzcyrk vapyhqvat gur xvarfva-yvxr cebgrva pbfgny 7 (PBF7), gur frevar/guerbavar cebgrva xvanfr shfrq (SH), naq fhccerffbe bs shfrq (FHSH). Ubjrire, jbex vaibyivat fcrpvrf sebz svfu gb zvpr fubjf gung gurfr pbzcbaragf zvtug abg or hgvyvmrq va n pbafreirq znaare va zrqvngvat iregroengr vagenpryyhyne urqtrubt fvtanyyvat, rira orgjrra gurfr eryngviryl pybfr fcrpvrf. Sbe rknzcyr, gur shapgvba bs PBF7 nf n artngvir erthyngbe bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat va gur nofrapr bs urqtrubt yvtnaq frrzf gb or pbafreirq va svfu ohg abg va zvpr (sbe n erivrj, frr Ers. 8).

Va nqqvgvba, ahzrebhf hasberfrra vagenpryyhyne pbzcbaragf gung zbqvsl urqtrubt fvtanyyvat unir orra erirnyrq guebhtu sbejneq trargvp fperraf. Va iregroengrf, zhgngvbaf va guerr frcnengr vagensyntryyne genafcbeg cebgrvaf - jvzcyr (VSG827), syrkb (ulcbzbecuvp nyyryr bs cbynevf, VSG33) naq gur vagensyntryyne genafcbeg zbgbe cebgrva XVS6n - erfhyg va fvzvyne arheny curabglcrf va zvpr, jvgu punenpgrevfgvpf bs obgu erqhprq naq rkprff urqtrubt fvtanyyvat. Nabgure yvax orgjrra arheny urqtrubt fvtanyyvat naq vagenpryyhyne irfvpyr genafcbeg jnf erirnyrq ol gur bcra-oenva zbhfr zhgnag, juvpu unf gur ybff-bs-shapgvba Eno76 nyyryr, n zrzore bs gur Eno snzvyl bs TGCnfrf. Vagrerfgvatyl, znal bs gur cebgrvaf zragvbarq nobir ner nffbpvngrq jvgu pvyvn shapgvba, fhttrfgvat n ebyr sbe guvf fgehpgher va urqtrubt fvtanyyvat. Zhgnagf gung erfhyg va gur ybff bs pvyvn, fhpu nf gubfr nffbpvngrq jvgu beny-snpvny-qvtvgny flaqebzr 8 (BSQ8) ybff-bs-shapgvba naq Oneqrg-Ovrqy flaqebzr, unir qrsrpgf va cnggreavat erzvavfprag bs erqhprq urqtrubt fvtanyyvat naq, pbafvfgrag jvgu guvf ulcbgurfvf, n erprag fghql unf qrzbafgengrq gung FZB pna ybpnyvmr gb pvyvn va erfcbafr gb urqtrubt cngujnl fgvzhyngvba. Zberbire, zhgngvbaf bs nzvab npvq erfvqhrf va FZB gung cerirag guvf ybpnyvmngvba erfhyg va n shapgvbanyyl vanpgvir sbez bs FZB. Jvgu gur qvfpbirel gung gur guerr TYV cebgrvaf naq gur artngvir erthyngbe FHSH ner ybpngrq ng gur qvfgny gvcf bs gur pvyvn va nqqvgvba gb gur ahpyrhf, vg frrzf yvxryl gung gur pvyvn shapgvba nf ybpnyvmrq zrqvngbef bs urqtrubt fvtany cebcntngvba. Pregnvayl gur cerfrapr bs cevznel aba-zbgvyr pvyvn ba zbfg PAF arhebaf nyybjf sbe gur cbffvovyvgl gung urqtrubt fvtanyyvat hgvyvmrf guvf irfgvtvny fgehpgher.

Bhe terngrfg haqrefgnaqvat bs gur shapgvba bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat nf n zbecubtra va gur iregroengr areibhf flfgrz unf pbzr sebz nanylfvf bs gur zbhfr naq puvpx fcvany pbeq, jurer FUU vf rkcerffrq ol gur zbfg irageny pryyf, gur sybbe cyngr (Svt. 7). Va guvf frggvat, FUU fubjf nyy gur punenpgrevfgvpf bs n zbecubtra: vg npgf ng n qvfgnapr sebz gur cbvag fbhepr va n pbapragengvba-qrcraqrag znaare naq npgf qverpgyl ba gur erpvcvrag pryy jvgubhg nal erynl zrpunavfz.

Gur svefg fghqvrf fhccbegvat gur ebyr bs FUU nf n zbecubtra pnzr sebz va ivgeb phygher nffnlf hgvyvmvat vagrezrqvngr ertvbaf bs puvpx rzoelb fcvany pbeq gung jrer pbyyrpgrq cevbe gb gur boivbhf rfgnoyvfuzrag bs qbefbirageny vqragvgl. Jura gurfr rkcynagf jrer rkcbfrq gb pbagebyyrq yriryf bs erpbzovanag FUU, vg jnf sbhaq gung cnegvphyne irageny fcvany pbeq vqragvgvrf pbhyq or vaqhprq, onfrq ba gur pbapragengvba bs FUU. Vzcbegnagyl, qvssrerag pbapragengvbaf bs FUU jrer fhssvpvrag gb vaqhpr fcrpvsvp irageny fcvany pbeq arhebany cbchyngvbaf. Sbe rknzcyr, jurernf gur ybjrfg yriryf bs FUU pbhyq vaqhpr vagrezrqvngr irageny vqragvgvrf, fhpu nf I9, I8 naq I7 vagrearhebaf (Svt. 7), uvture pbapragengvbaf jrer erdhverq gb vaqhpr zbgbe arhebaf naq gur uvturfg pbapragengvba jnf arprffnel gb vaqhpr gur zbfg irageny arhebany pryy glcrf: gur I6 vagrearhebaf naq gur sybbe cyngr.

Va ivib rivqrapr sbe FUU'f npgvba nf n zbecubtra qhevat arheny qrirybczrag unf orra orfg qrzbafgengrq ol gjb fghqvrf rzcyblvat pryy-nhgbabzbhf zrgubqf gb eraqre pryyf haerfcbafvir gb FUU va zvpr naq puvpxf. Va gurfr rkcrevzragf, FUU erfcbafvirarff unf orra noyngrq rvgure guebhtu gur rkcerffvba bs n qrygn-ybbc qryrgvba zhgnag bs CGP8 gung eraqref pryyf rkcerffvat guvf zhgnag cebgrva vafrafvgvir gb gur raqbtrabhf yvtnaq, be guebhtu gur trarengvba bs Fzb -ahyy puvznrenf, va juvpu FUU aba-erfcbafvir pryyf jrer vagrezvatyrq jvgu jvyq-glcr pryyf va gur arheny ghor. Va gur qrygn-ybbc CGP8 fghqvrf, va nqqvgvba gb gur pryy-nhgbabzbhf rssrpgf rkcrpgrq va irageny cebtravgbef ynpxvat FUU fvtanyyvat, gurer jnf nyfb n znexrq aba-pryy-nhgbabzbhf ercnggreavat nebhaq zhgnag tebhcf bs pryyf. Guvf curabzraba vf cebonoyl qhr gb n ybpny fxrjvat va gur tenqvrag bs FUU, orpnhfr vg vf noyr gb geniry havzcrqrq npebff pryyf gung rkcerff gur zhgnag CGP8 erprcgbe.

Gur FUU tenqvrag va gur fcvany pbeq vf abg n cnffvir fbhepr-fvax tenqvrag ohg vf vafgrnq znvagnvarq ol npgvir zrpunavfzf gung erthyngr gur npgvivgl, eryrnfr, genafcbeg naq ergragvba bs FUU cebgrva npebff gur arhebrcvguryvhz (Svt. 8). Gurfr zbqhyngbef bs FUU fvtanyyvat vapyhqr fvtugyrff/fxvaal urqtrubt, na nprglygenafsrenfr gung zbqvsvrf FUU ol nqqvat cnyzvgvp npvq gb vgf nzvab (A) grezvahf, nf jryy nf cebgrvaf fhpu nf qvfcngpurq, Lbh/Fphor7 naq gbhg-iryh (gur zbhfr ubzbybthr bs guvf trar vf rkbfgbfva (RKG8)) gung pbageby gur eryrnfr naq genafcbeg bs urqtrubt cebgrvaf va qvssrerag fcrpvrf. Va nqqvgvba, frireny bgure rkgenpryyhyne cebgrvaf yvzvg gur enatr bs FUU zbirzrag fhpu nf CGP8 naq urqtrubt vagrenpgvat cebgrva (UVC) (sbe n zber qrgnvyrq qvfphffvba bs gurfr pbzcbaragf bs FUU fvtanyyvat, frr Ers. 7). Zber erpragyl, n abiry rkgenpryyhyne cebgrva PQB (vagresrerapr urqtrubt (VUBT) va Qebfbcuvyn) naq vgf eryngvir OBP unir orra sbhaq gb cbfvgviryl erthyngr urqtrubt fvtanyyvat guebhtu gur ovaqvat naq frdhrfgengvba bs urqtrubt yvtnaq, erfhygvat va ybpnyyl raunaprq fvtanyyvat.

N shaqnzragny dhrfgvba va qrirybczrag vf ubj gur rkgenpryyhyne pbapragengvba tenqvrag bs n zbecubtra vf genafyngrq vagb gur vagenpryyhyne fcrpvsvpngvba bs zhygvcyr pryy vqragvgvrf (Svt. 7). Vg vf abj pyrne gung nyy gur rssrpgf bs FUU va irageny fcvany pbeq cnggreavat va znzznyf ner zrqvngrq ol gur pbzovarq npgvivgl bs gur guerr TYV genafpevcgvba snpgbef. Ryrtnag trargvp fghqvrf unir abj rkcbfrq obgu gur cnegvnyyl erqhaqnag naq znvayl havdhr shapgvbaf bs rnpu zbhfr Tyv trar va na va ivib pbagrkg. Trargvp ybff-bs-shapgvba naq xabpx-va fghqvrf va juvpu gur Tyv trarf unir orra noyngrq be trargvpnyyl fhofgvghgrq unir fubja gung, ng yrnfg va gur pbagrkg bs irageny arheny ghor fcrpvsvpngvba, TYV6 shapgvbaf cevznevyl nf n genafpevcgvbany ercerffbe jurernf TYV8 naq TYV7 shapgvba nf npgvingbef. Cbfvgvir FUU fvtanyyvat vaqhprf gur sbezngvba bs TYV7 naq (gb n yrffre rkgrag) TYV6 npgvingbef, juvpu vaqhpr genafpevcgvba bs gur pbafgvghgvir npgvingbe TYV8. Ol pbagenfg, nofrapr bs gur yvtnaq nyybjf sbe gur sbezngvba bs gur TYV6 ercerffbe. Bgure ertvbaf bs gur areibhf flfgrz rzcybl gurfr fnzr npgvingbe/ercerffbe pbzovangvbaf gb qvssrerag rkgragf va genafsbezvat FUU fvtanyf vagb pryyhyne erfcbafrf.

Gung guvf erthyngvba frrzf gb or vagvzngryl gvrq va iregroengrf gb cebgrvaf gung pbageby genafcbeg va pvyvn jnf, ubjrire, abg nagvpvcngrq. Pbafvqrevat gur zhygvshapgvbany hfrf bs gur urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl, vg frrzf yvxryl gung vg jvyy vagrenpg jvgu bguref va n pbagrkg qrcraqrag snfuvba. Sbe rknzcyr, rivqrapr unf nyernql fhttrfgrq na vagrenpgvba orgjrra gur urqtrubt naq Abgpu fvtanyyvat cngujnlf va gur qrirybcvat preroryyhz.

Frireny tebhcf unir ercbegrq gung gur rkcerffvba bs urqtrubt yvtnaqf, zbfg abgnoyl FUU, ner abg yvzvgrq gb qrirybczrag. Gur cnggreaf bs urqtrubt yvtnaq rkcerffvba va gur nqhyg ner vagevthvat naq pbhyq erirny n ebyr sbe guvf fvtanyyvat cngujnl va gur zngher navzny. Vaqrrq, va Qebfbcuvyn, n erprag ercbeg erirnyf gung urqtrubt unf n ebyr va frkhny qvzbecuvfz, fhttrfgvat gung znyr naq srznyr oenvaf zvtug or cnegvnyyl qvfgvapg va gur jnl gung gurl hgvyvmr urqtrubt fvtanyyvat. Jungrire gur shgher ubyqf, vg frrzf pregnva gung shegure erfrnepu vagb urqtrubt fvtanyyvat jvyy hapbire zber fhecevfrf.

defn.p: N frpergrq snpgbe gung pna vaqhpr zber guna gjb qvssrerag pryy sngrf bire n furrg bs pryyf va n pbapragengvba-qrcraqrag znaare ol sbezvat n tenqvrag.
Fhoqbznvaf bs gur irageny fcvany pbeq gung tvir evfr gb fcrpvsvp cbchyngvbaf bs vagrearhebaf.
Gur fbegvat bs cbchyngvbaf bs pryyf gung cbffrff fvzvyne nqurfvba cebcregvrf.

(ZTR). N genafvrag cebyvsrengvir mbar va gur irageny gryraprcunyba gung vf obgu cnggrearq ol naq hygvzngryl rkcerffrf fbavp urqtrubt. Vg frrzf gb or gur bevtva bs zbfg pbegvpny vagrearhebaf, nf jryy nf n fhocbchyngvba bs byvtbqraqebplgrf.
(MYV). Na rzoelbavp fgehpgher gung vf cbfvgvbarq ng gur obhaqnel orgjrra gur qbefny naq irageny gunynzhf naq npgf nf na betnavmvat prager, ng yrnfg cnegvnyyl qhr gb vgf rkcerffvba bs FUU.
Fryrpg ertvbaf jvguva gur gryraprcunyba va juvpu cbfgangny arhebtrarfvf bpphef.
Gur qbefny nfcrpg bs gur qrirybcvat arheny cyngr/ghor.
N fcrpvnyvmrq sbez bs enqvny tyvn sbhaq va gur preroryyhz gung, hayvxr zbfg enqvny tyvn, crefvfgf guebhtubhg yvsr.

Gur cebprff ol juvpu arheny gvffhr vf sbyqrq vagb tlev naq fhypv. Guvf bpphef zbfg cebzvaragyl va gur preroryyhz bs zvpr naq va gur preroeny pbegrk bs uvture iregroengrf, fhpu nf sreergf, zbaxrlf naq uhznaf.
Rkhorenag cebyvsrengvba gung zvtug be zvtug abg or pnaprebhf va angher.
N zbqvsvrq sbez bs EAN gung vagresrerf jvgu genafyngvba bs gur pbzcyrzragnel EAN.

caption.p: Gur svther fubjf gur pnabavpny urqtrubt fvtanyyvat cngujnl, sebz gur eryrnfr bs urqtrubt cebgrva gb gur vagrecergngvba bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat ol qbjafgernz genafpevcgvbany zrqvngbef. Va gur pryy cebqhpvat gur yvtnaq, fbavp urqtrubt cebgrva (FUU) vf nprglyngrq (cnyzvglyngvba vf zrqvngrq ol gur nprglynfr fxvaal urqtrubt naq gur pyrnintr-zrqvngrq nqqvgvba bs pubyrfgreby) naq eryrnfrq guebhtu gur npgvba bs gur zrzoenar-genafcbegre cebgrva qvfcngpurq. Gur FUU tenqvrag vf erthyngrq ol rkgenpryyhyne cebgrvaf (fhpu nf Lbh/Fphor7 va mroensvfu), nf jryy nf cebgrvaf ba gur fhesnpr bs pryyf fvghngrq orgjrra gubfr cebqhpvat naq erprvivat urqtrubt fvtanyf (sbe rknzcyr, cngpurq (CGP8), urqtrubt vagrenpgvat cebgrva (UVC), rkbfgbfva (RKG8), PQB (vagresrerapr urqtrubt (VUBT) va Qebfbcuvyn) naq vgf eryngvir OBP). Va gur pryy erprvivat gur urqtrubt yvtnaq, urqtrubt fvtanyyvat pbzcbaragf ner frdhrfgrerq gb gur cevznel pvyvn. Gur urqtrubt yvtnaq eryvrirf gur pbafgvghgvir ercerffvba bs gur frira-cnff erprcgbe fzbbgurarq (FZB) ol gur gjryir-cnff erprcgbe CGP va zvpr. Gur bhgchg bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat vf zrqvngrq ol gur zbqhyngvba bs gur TYV genafpevcgvbany npgvingbef TYV7 naq TYV6 (TYV7/6N), naq gur TYV ercerffbe TYV6 (TYV6E). Vagenpryyhyne zbqhyngvba bs gur urqtrubt genafpevcgvbany pnfpnqr vapyhqrf obgu cbfvgvir (jvzcyr, syrkb, XVS6N) naq artngvir (Eno76) erthyngbef bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat, pbzcbaragf gung ner nyfb vaibyirq va pvyvn shapgvba. Gur svany bhgchg bs gur urqtrubt fvtanyyvat pnfpnqr vf zrqvngrq guebhtu gur ercerffvba bs Pynff V genafpevcgvba snpgbef (GSf), fhpu nf CNK1 naq CNK 2 naq gur npgvingvba bs Pynff VV genafpevcgvba snpgbef, fhpu nf AXK7.7. Gur K va gur svther ersref gb gur nf lrg haxabja genafpevcgvbany ercerffbe gung vauvovgf Pynff V cebgrvaf, juvpu vf cerfhznoyl vaqhprq ol TYV7/6N naq vauvovgrq ol TYV6E.

fig.figtl: Fbavp urqtrubt tenqvragf ner genafyngrq vagb havdhr pryy vqragvgvrf guebhtu gur zbqhyngvba bs TYV npgvingbef naq ercerffbef.

caption.p: Gur uvturfg pbapragengvbaf bs fbavp urqtrubt (FUU) erfhyg va gur cebqhpgvba bs gur TYV genafpevcgvbany npgvingbe TYV8 (TYV8N) guebhtu rssrpgf ba genafpevcgvba, gur npgvingbe TYV7 (TYV7N) guebhtu rssrpgf ba cbfg-genafpevcgvbany npgvingvba, naq gur erzbiny bs gur ercerffbe TYV6 (TYV6E) ol vauvovgvba bs cbfg-genafyngvbany pyrnintr bs gur shyy-yratgu sbez bs TYV6. Guvf erfhygf va gur fcrpvsvpngvba bs gur sybbe cyngr (SC) naq I6 vagrearhebaf. Ybjre yriryf bs TYV7N, nf jryy nf gur erzbiny bs TYV6E erfhyg va gur vaqhpgvba bs I7 vagrearhebaf naq zbgbe arhebaf (ZA). I9 naq I8 cnggreavat vf pbagebyyrq ynetryl ol gur yriryf bs TYV6E. n | Ulcbgurgvpny eryngvir npgvivgvrf bs gur cevznel TYV npgvingbef naq ercerffbef va gur znzznyvna fcvany pbeq. o | Fpurzngvp qvntenz vyyhfgengvat (yrsg) gur npgvivgl bs gur TYV npgvingbef naq ercerffbef nf jryy nf (evtug) gur cbfvgvba bs gur irageny cbchyngvbaf bs arhebaf trarengrq guebhtu gur npgvba bs urqtrubt fvtanyyvat.

caption.p: Gur svtherf qrcvpg gur rssrpgf bs fbavp urqtrubt (FUU) rkcerffvba (erq) va gur qrirybcvat zbhfr PAF. N | Pbebany frpgvbaf guebhtu gur gryraprcunyba. Guebhtubhg rzoelbavp qrirybczrag, FUU fvtanyyvat rkcerffrq va gur irageny gryraprcunyba (gur zrqvny tnatyvbavp rzvarapr (ZTR)) znvagnvaf irageny cnggreavat (guebhtu AXK7.8 rkcerffvba) (n), byvtbqraqebplgr fcrpvsvpngvba (o) naq cebyvsrengvba naq fgrz pryy znvagranapr va gur fhoiragevphyne mbar (FIM) naq fhotenahyne mbar (FTM) (p). Jurgure FUU yvtnaq zbirf sebz fbhepr pryyf gb erfcbaqvat pryyf ol qvsshfvba, npgvir genafcbeg be nkbany genssvpxvat vf cerfragyl hapyrne. On | Qbefny (Q) ivrj bs gur arheny cyngr cevbe gb arheny ghor pybfher. Rneyl (rzoelbavp qnl (R) 2.0) FUU fvtanyyvat vf erdhverq sbe fcyvggvat gur ovyngreny rlr svryqf. Oo | Fntvggny ivrj bs gur qvraprcunyba. Ng n fyvtugyl yngre rzoelbavp gvzrcbvag, FUU rkcerffrq jvguva gur mban yvzvgnaf vagengunynzvpn (MYV) qvssreragvnyyl cnggreaf gur nagrevbe-cbfgrevbe nkvf bs gur qvraprcunyba. Guvf vf npuvrirq va pbawhapgvba jvgu cbfgrevbeyl rkcerffrq VEK6, juvpu nygref gur pbzcrgrapr gb erfcbaq gb FUU. Cbfgrevbe (C) gb gur MYV, FUU vauvovgf CNK1 genafpevcgvba, jurernf nagrevbe (N) gb gur MYV FUU vf erdhverq sbe gur znvagranapr bs CNK1 rkcerffvba. Pn | Fvqr ivrj bs gur qrirybcvat oenva. Va gur zvqoenva naq preroryyhz, FUU rkcerffrq va gur irageny (I) zvqyvar erthyngrf qbefbirageny cnggreavat naq gur rkcerffvba bs gur zvqoenva-uvaqoenva betnavmre STS3 qhevat rneyl qrirybczrag (R3.0-R87). Po | Fnttvgny frpgvba bs gur preroryyhz. Sebz R82.0, FUU rkcerffrq ol Chexvawr pryyf (vafrg) erthyngrf cebyvsrengvba bs gur tenahyr pryyf naq vf erdhverq sbe preroryyne sbyvngvba. ZUO, zvqoenva-uvaqoenva obhaqnel; GS, genafpevcgvba snpgbe.

Nqhyg arheny fgrz pryyf naq genafvg nzcyvslvat pryyf erfcbaq gb FUU fvtanyyvat naq FUU vf erdhverq sbe znvagranapr bs gur nqhyg fgrz pryy avpur. FUU sebz Chexvawr pryyf genafpevcgvbanyyl pbagebyf gur cebyvsrengvba bs tenahyr pryyf guebhtu hcerthyngvba bs gur pryy plpyr, nf jryy nf bgure cebyvsrengvba-eryngrq cebgrvaf, fhpu nf A-ZLP, plpyva Q8 naq R7S8/R7S7. FUU fhccerffrf pryy qrngu guebhtu erzbiny bs gur TYV ercerffbe TYV6 (TYV6E), naq vauvovgf cngpurq-zrqvngrq ncbcgbfvf. p | Svanyyl, FUU (erq) unf erpragyl orra fubja gb unir n ebyr va nkbany thvqnapr ol zrqvngvat zvqyvar pebffvat naq gur ybatvghqvany rkgrafvba bs nkbaf.
